quote: We must not be afraid of dreaming the seemingly impossible if we want the seemingly impossible to become a reality. – Vaclav Havel
fact: There is a seven letter word in the English language that contains ten words without rearranging any of its letters, "therein": the, there, he, in, rein, her, here, ere, therein, herein.
joke: My first time using an elevator was an uplifting experience. The second time let me down.
